column5: today, just got up and went fishing while my mom racked leafs at the trailer instead of playing hockey with some buddies and ended meeting up wiht one
Good stuff Bud. Chris is on his way to the trailer. Don't tell him about your catch. You embarrass the poor guy.
haha im going again on sunday so ill tell him then
Wow! That is impressive! Awesome catch! Better than hockey!

nice shootin Shinny...  Roy - every fish this young lad catches is just making Chris feel better for taking him under the wing... Give a kid a fish ...feed him for the day Teach a kid to fish feed him for life...  Shinny - keep schoolin the ole dogs
I'm not clear on who took whom under their wing. I know Chris has learned a lot!
great stuff!!nice fish....looks like a great place too...
Nice job Shinny. Some beauties there.  Josh, was good to meet you yesterday
the first picture Josh posted of himself with a fish.....did anyone happen to notice the fish sitting in the water above his fishes head?
nice going. Those are some beauts
Yeah I thought the same thing.

Just got back in town from the trailer. Went 2 for 2 Saturday and 7 for 13 today...Camera wouldn't turn on this weekend so no pics,piece of junk !! Did fish with Shinny half of today though and he was 0 for 0 when I left. I think he stayed on the river till dark so he may have some stories to tell next time I speak with him. I just love watching that kid  land fish  Josh,with that back pack you got him full of goodies and Andrews hand me down Hodgeman neoprene waders the kid is starting to look like a true steelheader. His dad is going to get him an Islander for Christmas and he's saving up his allowance for a new float rod for next year as well....Thank god he's not old enough to have any credit cards right now
i got nothing after you left chris but i have a debit card if that counts haha
Great job SHINNY    Those are some beauty steel
Very sweet fish Devin   ...That pool looks so different now since I fished it with you a few weeks ago.
